titleStmt.title: The second and third advice to a painter, for drawing the history of our navall actions, the two last years, 1665 and 1666 in answer to Mr. Waller.
titleStmt.author: Denham, John, Sir, 1615-1669.
Marvell, Andrew, 1621-1678.

notesStmt.note: "Attributed to Sir John Denham, but most probably not by him. Sometimes attributed to Andrew Marvell." Cf. BM.
Reproduction of originals in the Duke University Library and the British Library.
